faqs.question: What types of jobs do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer both part-time and full-time remote jobs, as well as project-focused jobs.

faqs.question: In which currency do you pay?
faqs.answer: We pay in either Euros or Egyptian pounds, depending on your preference.

faqs.question: What happens after I join the Tadamun talent pool?
faqs.answer: After you join our talent pool, we will reach out to learn more about your skills and aspirations. When we find a company that aligns with your profile, we will immediately contact you and help you in onboarding.

faqs.question: Do I need to have prior remote work experience?
faqs.answer: While prior remote work experience can be beneficial, it is not a requirement. We value skills, dedication, and the willingness to adapt to remote work environments.
